1.0.name: wordpress/replace-howdy-with-welcome
1.0.description:
We work with clients everyday and needed a more polite way of "Welcoming" them to the dashboard. This plugin simply replaces the word "Howdy" with "Welcome" in the top right hand corner of the dashboard.

To learn more about the projects and plugins we can develop, visit http://www.cohesivewebdesigns.com
